symbolDetail.errorMessage: We couldn't find the symbol you're looking for.

hero.heading: Discover the World's Cultural Symbols
hero.subheading: Explore, learn and contribute to our growing collection of symbolic heritage

footer.tagline: Preserving and celebrating the world's symbolic heritage

whatIs.question: What is Symbolica?
whatIs.answer: Symbolica is a digital platform dedicated to cataloging, preserving, and sharing cultural symbols from around the world.

howContribute.question: How can I contribute?
howContribute.answer: You can contribute by submitting symbols, improving descriptions, or helping with translations.

rights.question: What about rights to symbols?
rights.answer: Symbolica respects traditional ownership and rights to cultural symbols. We provide attribution and context for all symbols.

mapExplorer.title: Symbol Map Explorer
mapExplorer.description: Discover symbols and patterns across the world's cultures through our interactive map
mapExplorer.betaNotice: The map feature is currently in beta. Some locations may not be accurately represented.
mapExplorer.listViewComingSoon: The list view is coming soon. Stay tuned!

symbolExplorer.title: Symbol Explorer
symbolExplorer.description: Explore our collection of cultural symbols, patterns and motifs
symbolExplorer.noResults: No symbols match your filter criteria
symbolExplorer.mapViewDescription: Explore symbols based on their geographical origin and distribution

howItWorks.intro: Our platform makes it easy to discover, contribute, and learn about cultural symbols from around the world.

1.title: Upload & Discover
1.desc: Upload images of cultural symbols or discover existing ones in our collection.

2.title: Tag & Catalog
2.desc: Add metadata, historical context, and cultural information to symbols.

3.title: Explore & Learn
3.desc: Browse our curated collection of symbols across different cultures and time periods.

4.title: Share & Connect
4.desc: Share symbols with others and connect with a community of cultural enthusiasts.

features.title: Platform Features
features.description: Discover the tools and features that make Symbolica unique

catalog.title: Comprehensive Catalog
catalog.description: Access thousands of symbols from diverse cultures around the world.

interactive.title: Interactive Exploration
interactive.description: Explore symbols through maps, timelines, and cultural connections.

ai.title: AI-Powered Recognition
ai.description: Identify symbols in images using our advanced AI recognition system.

community.title: Community Contributions
community.description: Join a global community preserving cultural heritage through symbols.

mapping.title: Global Mapping
mapping.description: Visualize symbolic connections across cultures and time periods through our interactive map interface.

identification.title: Symbol Identification
identification.description: Upload images to identify symbols and discover their cultural context, history, and meaning.

documentation.title: Collaborative Documentation
documentation.description: Contribute to our database by adding symbols, their historical context, and cultural significance.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.subtitle: Connect with fellow enthusiasts and contribute to the preservation of symbolic heritage.
community.description: Connect with enthusiasts of cultural symbols and heritage from around the world.

thematicCommunities.title: Thematic Communities
thematicCommunities.description: Join specialized communities focused on specific symbolic traditions, regions, or time periods.

personalSpace.title: Personal Collections
personalSpace.description: Create and organize your own library of symbolic patterns that inspire you.

intuitiveNavigation.title: Advanced Discovery
intuitiveNavigation.description: Explore connections between symbols across cultures and time periods through our intuitive navigation.

testimonials.title: What Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our community of researchers, artists, and cultural enthusiasts.

fallback.name: John Smith
fallback.quote: Symbolica has transformed how I explore and learn about cultural patterns and symbols. The community is incredibly knowledgeable and supportive.

roadmap.title: Project Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our vision for the future of Symbolica

phase0.title: Design and research
phase0.description: Project definition, preliminary studies, and identification of enthusiast community needs

phase1.title: Community platform
phase1.description: Launch of basic tools for sharing, analyzing, and collaboratively documenting heritage symbols

phase2.title: Cultural intelligence
phase2.description: Deployment of advanced algorithms for identification, comparison, and contextual analysis of patterns

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Collaborating with museums, universities, and cultural institutions worldwide.

callToAction.joinUs: Join Us in Preserving Cultural Heritage
callToAction.description: Be part of a global community dedicated to documenting and celebrating the world's symbolic traditions.
callToAction.support: Supported by grants from cultural preservation foundations worldwide.

about.missionStatement: To catalog and preserve the world's symbolic heritage for future generations.
about.visionStatement: Creating the most comprehensive digital library of cultural symbols from around the world.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest additions and features
newsletter.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. No spam, ever.

uploadTools.title: Upload & Analysis Tools
uploadTools.subtitle: Contribute to our growing database of symbols

capture.title: Capture & Upload
capture.desc: Take photos of patterns from artifacts, architecture, or textiles and upload them directly to our platform

analyze.title: Automated Analysis
analyze.desc: Our AI system examines your submissions to identify patterns, match them with our database, and suggest cultural contexts

share.title: Share & Collaborate
share.desc: Once analyzed, your contributions become part of our global repository and can be studied by the community

process.title: Analysis Process
process.subtitle: Discover how we transform artifacts into cataloged patterns
process.example: Our system identifies recurring patterns, extracts them, and compares them to our database.

gamification.title: Earn Rewards for Your Contributions
gamification.subtitle: Join our community and earn points, badges, and recognition for contributing to the world of symbols

badges.title: Collect Badges
badges.description: Earn unique badges for your achievements and display them on your profile

points.title: Earn Points
points.description: Get points for every contribution, comment, and validation you make

leaderboard.title: Climb the Rankings
leaderboard.description: Compete with other contributors and climb up global and regional leaderboards

achievements.title: Complete Achievements
achievements.description: Take on special challenges to unlock unique rewards and recognition

map.comingSoon: We're working on an interactive map to explore symbols around the world

contributions.title: Contributions
contributions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this contribution?
contributions.dragImages: Drag and drop your images here
contributions.contributionSubmitted: Your contribution has been successfully submitted and will be reviewed by our team.

contributions.emptyDescription: Be the first to contribute to our symbolic heritage database
